mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.usergroup_id) FROM `t_usergroup_user_map` a inner join t_usergroup b on b.id=a.usergroup_id inner JOIN sys_role c on b.ROLE_ID=c.ROLE_ID and c.type='audit' where a.USER_ID=#{applyUserId}

select count(1) from t_virtualmachine
where exists (select 1 from cmp_workorder b where a.appNo=b.appNo and b.applyUserId=#{applyUserId})
where exists (select 1 from cmp_workorder b where a.appNo in( SELECT b.BUSINESS_KEY_ FROM `act_hi_actinst` a INNER JOIN act_hi_procinst b on a.PROC_INST_ID_=b.PROC_INST_ID_ where a.ASSIGNEE_ in (select c.USER_ID from t_usergroup_user_map c where FIND_IN_SET(c.usergroup_id, #{audit}))))
select count(1) from t_hostmachine where type!='kvm'
select count(1) from t_hostmachine where type='kvm'
